dct_title_s: A general chart of South America
dct_description_sm: Shows the coasts of South and Central America, Mexico, the West Indies and the southern United States. "527." Historic Maps copy has label on verso: South America, including the Coasts of Mexico to St. Blas, and the W. India Is.
dct_publisher_sm: London : published according to Act of Parliament at the Hydrographical Office of the Admiralty, Novr. 4th.1824.
